document.full_text: snowkiting, the latest extreme sport to meld wind power with the acrobatics of snowboarding and skiing, is growing in popularity and its participants are at growing risk of injury, especially to the knees and back, an austrian study finds.
document.title: snowkiters need protective gear: study
lines_and_colors: snowkiting, the latest extreme sport to meld wind power with the acrobatics of snowboarding and skiing, is growing in popularity and its participants are at growing risk of injury, especially to the knees and back, an austrian study finds.
